HybridCLR是一个特性完整、零成本、高性能、低内存的近乎完美的Unity全平台原生c#热更方案。 HybridCLR is a fully featured, zero-cost, high-performance, low-memory solution for Unity's all-platform native c# hotupdate.
RE2 is a fast, safe, thread-friendly alternative to backtracking regular expression engines like those used in PCRE, Perl, and Python. It is a C++ library.
